evidence.claim: Towne Home Care engages with HIPAA compliance in their operations.
They utilize health data standards including FHIR and HL7 in their services.
The company handles X12 transactions as part of their billing processes.
The mention of integration with EHR systems indicates support for health-tech interoperability standards.
Towne Home Care is compliant with HIPAA regulations to protect patient data.

icp.icp_reason: Limited evidence of X12 usage or API automation for healthcare data exchange found.
